title: How to Pack Your Gym Bag for School (Girls)

steps.headline: Get a gym bag that's right for you.
steps.description: Make sure you like it, because you're probably going to be stuck with it for a while. Also, pick a bag that you won't be embarrassed to be seen with. Would you rather have a plastic bag or a nice gym bag? Think about that.

steps.headline: Know the essentials that you need.
steps.description: Those usually are things such as: a t-shirt, shorts, deodorant, hair ties, etc.

steps.headline: Make sure you bring your own water bottle.
steps.description: Drinking out of your own water bottle is better than drinking from a water fountain or somebody else's water bottle.

steps.headline: Get comfortable clothes.
steps.description: You wouldn't want to be itchy and uncomfortable during gym class. This means that you should not pack itchy knitted clothing, etc.

steps.headline: Make sure that your running shoes are right size for you.
steps.description: If they're not, you could get seriously injured. They have to be not too big and not too small for you.Also bring extra socks in case of emergencies.
